headline: Interpublic Group acquires Intelligence Node, terms not disclosed
summary: Interpublic Group (IPG) announced the acquisition of Intelligence Node, an eCommerce intelligence platform. This strategic move significantly enhances Interpublic’s commerce capabilities, providing clients with real-time product and market intelligence to understand shopper trends, drive sales growth and optimize performance in the dynamic digital marketplace.
